kpi.name: RNC_743a
kpi.formula: (intsysho.hho_att_caused_sho_incap_rt + intsysho.immed_hho_csd_sho_incap_rt + intsysho.hho_att_caused_sho_incap_nrt + intsysho.immed_hho_csd_sho_incap_nrt + intsysho.intra_intra_hho_att_rt + intsysho.intra_inter_hho_att_rt + intsysho.inter_hho_att_rt + intsysho.intra_intra_hho_att_nrt + intsysho.intra_inter_hho_att_nrt + intsysho.inter_hho_att_nrt)

kpi_info.title: Intra System Hard Handover Attempts
kpi_info.use: Number of Inter RNC Intra Frequency Hard Handover attempts and all Intra RNC/Inter RNC Inter Frequency Hard Handover Attempts.
kpi_info.formula:
SUM ( HHO_ATT_CAUSED_SHO_INCAP_RT
+ IMMED_HHO_CSD_SHO_INCAP_RT
+ HHO_ATT_CAUSED_SHO_INCAP_NRT
+ IMMED_HHO_CSD_SHO_INCAP_NRT
+ INTRA_INTRA_HHO_ATT_RT
+ INTRA_INTER_HHO_ATT_RT
+ INTER_HHO_ATT_RT
+ INTRA_INTRA_HHO_ATT_NRT
+ INTRA_INTER_HHO_ATT_NRT
+ INTER_HHO_ATT_NRT )

kpi.kpi_alias: IFHO Attempts, based on HO types and specific causes
